name: Forced Jump
desc: If an ally target's current HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or consuming HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP. This can restore HP equal to a maximum of 36% Max HP during a single action.
enhanced_desc: If an ally target's current HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or consuming HP, restores their HP by 20% of their Max HP. This can restore HP equal to a maximum of 50% Max HP during a single action.
